import React from "react"; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, Link } from "react-router-dom" import axios from "axios"; import Moment from 'react-moment'; export default function FriendsList(){ const baseURL = "http://localhost:4000/api/events/get"; const [usersList, setUsersList] = React.useState([]); React.useEffect(() => { getUsersList(); }, []); // Get list of users function getUsersList() { axios.get(`${baseURL}`).then((response) => { setUsersList(response.data); console.log(response.data); }); } return(
